meta.name: Georgie & Mandy's First Marriage
meta.description: Georgie & Mandy's First Marriage follows Georgie and Mandy as they raise their young family in Texas while navigating the challenges of adulthood, parenting and marriage.

videos.title: Bitin', Spankin' and a Load of Yankee Psychobabble
videos.overview: Georgie and Mandy get upset when Audrey disciplines CeeCee without their permission.

videos.title: Payback and a Partial Shebang
videos.overview: Georgie's feud with a rival store threatens his partnership with Ruben. Meanwhile, Mandy finds out Georgie's been keeping secrets from her.

videos.title: Miami Beach and a Magical Family Christmas
videos.overview: Georgie and Mandy struggle to balance work, family and the holidays when Audrey plans an unexpected Christmas vacation.

videos.title: A Bus Bench and Faith out the Wazoo
videos.overview: Audrey and Mary's feud rears its head when Georgie needs their help with the tire store, and Jim's forced to confront his age after a visit to the DMV.

videos.title: The 6:10 to Lubbock
videos.overview: Georgie and Mandy get fed up living with her parents, the McCallisters, on the series premiere of Georgie & Mandy's First Marriage.

videos.title: Some New York Nonsense
videos.overview: Georgie struggles to balance life, work and family. Mandy worries for Georgie's wellbeing and Missy gets into trouble at school.

videos.title: Secrets, Lies and a Chunk of Change
videos.overview: Georgie digs into Mandy's past when he discovers she's been hiding thousands of dollars of debt. Meanwhile, Mandy tries to right her wrongs by going back to work.

videos.title: Todd's Mom
videos.overview: Things get awkward when Georgie and Mandy try to make new friends. Meanwhile, Jim and Audrey get competitive playing a game with Connor. Beth, a fellow waitress Mandy befriends at the diner who is looking for fun in the wake of her recent divorce.

videos.title: Thanksgiving
videos.overview: Mandy struggles to get Georgie's family to join him for his first Thanksgiving without his dad.

videos.title: A Regular Samaritan
videos.overview: Georgie joins a church to sell tires to the congregation and Mandy worries there is more to it than that.

videos.title: An Old Mustang
videos.overview: Georgie worries that he's leaving Connor out of his new project with Jim. Meanwhile, Mandy and Audrey struggle to decorate CeeCee's nursery without fighting.

videos.title: Diet Crap
videos.overview: Tensions rise when Georgie intrudes on Mandy's new sales gig. Meanwhile, Audrey's conflicted when Jim makes it a point not to coddle Connor.

videos.title: A Tire Convention and the Moral High Ground
videos.overview: Georgie discovers that Jim's annual tire convention trip isn't what he says it is. Meanwhile, Mandy has doubts about the strength of her and Georgie's marriage.

videos.title: A House Divided
videos.overview: Audrey and Mary go to war over CeeCee, and Georgie and Mandy can't help but take sides.

videos.title: Working for the Enemy
videos.overview: Audrey's past rears its head when Georgie leaves the tire store to work for Fred Fagenbacher, Jim's longtime nemesis, and Mandy struggles to keep peace in the house.

videos.title: Typhoid Georgie
videos.overview: Georgie worries he's letting his family down when he's forced to stay home with a cold, and Mandy worries about how her career will affect her marriage.

videos.title: McAllister Auto Loves the Ladies
videos.overview: Jim feels ganged up on when Georgie and Audrey make changes to the tire store, and Mandy helps Georgie navigate a fight between her parents.

videos.title: A Sportsbook and a Breakup
videos.overview: Mandy finds out Meemaw runs an illegal sportsbook and decides she wants in on the action. Meanwhile, Georgie struggles to keep Mandy's new job a secret.

videos.title: Goddess of the Music Store
videos.overview: Georgie helps Connor impress his new crush, while Mandy, Audrey and Jim struggle to butt out of Connor's love life.

videos.title: Baby Fight
videos.overview: Georgie and Mandy worry they're not on the same page when they disagree about having another kid, and Mary, Jim and Audrey struggle to stay out of it.

videos.title: Two Idiots on a Dirt Bike
videos.overview: Georgie's attempt to break up Missy and her new boyfriend backfires.

videos.title: TV Money
videos.overview: Mandy tries to prove she's financially responsible after Jim and Georgie call out her poor spending habits, and Connor's new girlfriend needs a place to stay.

videos.title: Snitch v. Deadbeat
videos.overview: Mandy has to help Meemaw collect money from her dad when he loses some bets, while Georgie tries to intervene between his grandmother and his father-in-law.

videos.title: Ladies Love Brunch
videos.overview: Georgie tries to juggle his mom, his mother-in-law and Mandy on Mother's Day. Meanwhile, Audrey wants to meet Connor's girlfriend.

videos.title: Guilt Boots
videos.overview: Georgie panics when he learns that Jim is considering selling the tire store to his rival, and Mandy's forced to confront a long-running lie, on part one of the first season finale.

videos.title: Big Decisions
videos.overview: Tensions rise when Georgie finds out the truth about Mandy's boss, and Georgie does all he can to buy the tire store before Jim sells it, on part two of the first season finale.

videos.title: A Tie Breaker and a Huge Mistake
videos.overview: Tensions rise in the tire store when new co-owners Georgie and Ruben realize they can't agree on anything, and Jim struggles to find his purpose now that he's retired.

videos.title: Fan Mail and Old-Timey Organ Music
videos.overview: Georgie's upset when Mandy's new role as weekend weather girl gets her more attention from the men in town, and Connor turns to Jim for help when he's asked to play the organ at the high school baseball game.

videos.title: A Will and a Dead Man's Wife
videos.overview: Georgie's not ready for his mother to start dating again. Meanwhile, Jim and Audrey struggle to make their wills.

videos.title: Dirty Hands and a Barbed-Wire Fence
videos.overview: Georgie and Ruben are forced to get their hands dirty when Fred Fagenbacher tries to run them out of business. Meanwhile, Mandy grows suspicious of Georgie's lies.

videos.title: A Pregnancy Test and an Old Man's Gallbladder
videos.overview: Georgie's jealousy rears its head when Mandy gets sent on an overnight work trip with her ex and current boss, Scott. Meanwhile, Jim and Audrey panic when they find a pregnancy test in Connor's trash.

videos.title: Heartbreak and the Refuge of the Downtrodden
videos.overview: Georgie, Mandy and the family do their best to lift Connor's spirits during a rough patch while Connor tries to figure out a plan for his life.

videos.title: A Bus Bench and Faith out the Wazoo
videos.overview: Audrey and Mary's feud rears its head when Georgie needs their help with the tire store, and Jim's forced to confront his age after a visit to the DMV.

videos.title: Bitin', Spankin' and a Load of Yankee Psychobabble
videos.overview: Georgie and Mandy get upset when Audrey disciplines CeeCee without their permission.

videos.title: Payback and a Partial Shebang
videos.overview: Georgie's feud with a rival store threatens his partnership with Ruben. Meanwhile, Mandy finds out Georgie's been keeping secrets from her.

videos.title: Miami Beach and a Magical Family Christmas
videos.overview: Georgie and Mandy struggle to balance work, family and the holidays when Audrey plans an unexpected Christmas vacation.
